item.name: Reliquary of Dawn
entries: This talisman contains a discarded claw, scale, or fang from Eirdu, which many believe is the incarnation of the sun in Lorwyn. While you wear a Reliquary of Dawn, you are immune to the effects of Eventide.

item.name: Reliquary of Twilight
entries: This talisman contains a discarded claw, scale, or fang from Isilu, which many believe is the incarnation of the moon in Shadowmoor. While you wear a Reliquary of Twilight, you are immune to the effects of Morningtide.
